content.headline: Tailored, AI-driven solutions to protect your business
content.subtext: Protecting the digital future through innovative cybersecurity solutions, we empower businesses to safeguard their assets, ensure compliance, and maintain trust in an increasingly connected world.

cards.title: SIEM Threat Detection & Response
cards.description: Our 24/7 monitoring services use AI-powered tools to detect and neutralize threats before they can harm your business.

cards.title: Penetration Testing
cards.description: Identify and eliminate vulnerabilities in your network with our comprehensive penetration testing services.

cards.title: Incident Response
cards.description: In the event of a breach, our expert team reacts swiftly to minimize damage and restore your systems quickly.

cards.title: Network Security
cards.description: We offer end-to-end network security solutions, optimizing your infrastructure while securing it against unauthorized access.

cards.title: Security Awareness Training
cards.description: Empower your employees to recognize and respond to potential cyber threats with comprehensive training.

cards.title: Vulnerability Management
cards.description: Identify, assess, and fix system weaknesses to reduce security risks and enhance resilience.

aboutSection.title: Who We Are
aboutSection.description: At Cyberware Global Defense (CGD), we are committed to protecting the digital future through innovative solutions that safeguard businesses from evolving cyber threats. Our expert team combines cutting-edge technology with a proactive approach to cybersecurity, ensuring that your organization remains secure, compliant, and resilient in the face of emerging challenges.

promoSection.heading: Always On Guard: Your 24/7 Online Security Solution for Unmatched Protection

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.subtitle: Protecting Critical Industries with Cutting-Edge Cybersecurity Solutions

leadership.title: Our leadership team
leadership.subtitle: Meet the leaders behind CGD’s mission to protect businesses from evolving cyber threats.

members.name: Furkan Bajrami
members.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.
members.bio:
Furkan Bajrami is a cyber security expert with over a decade of experience in safeguarding organizations from digital threats. He holds a Master's degree in Cyber Security from Stanford University and certifications such as Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) and Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH). Furkan has collaborated with Fortune 500 companies to develop robust security frameworks and incident response strategies, specializing in network security and risk management.

Passionate about education, Furkan frequently speaks at industry conferences and conducts workshops to raise awareness about cyber threats and best practices for online safety. As an active member of several professional organizations, he contributes to research initiatives aimed at advancing the field, believing that effective cyber defense relies on empowering individuals and organizations to take proactive measures against potential threats.

members.name: Petar Ninovski
members.description: Petar has over 10 years of experience in cybersecurity and IT consulting.
members.bio:
Petar Ninovski is an accomplished entrepreneur and IT consultant with a focus on cybersecurity strategy and innovation. With over a decade of experience, he has spearheaded projects that enable organizations to navigate complex digital landscapes securely. Petar holds a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and is certified in ITIL and Cybersecurity Management.

As Co-Founder and COO, Petar drives operational excellence and technological advancement within CGD. His leadership has been instrumental in deploying advanced security tools and fostering partnerships with key industry stakeholders. Petar is dedicated to helping clients safeguard their data and systems while ensuring compliance with ever-evolving regulatory standards. Outside of work, he mentors emerging cybersecurity professionals and contributes to thought leadership through articles and panel discussions.

members.name: Lena Müller
members.description: With over 12 years of experience in cybersecurity and technology development.
members.bio:
Lena Müller is a visionary technology leader with expertise in cybersecurity architecture and software development. She has over 12 years of experience creating scalable solutions for multinational enterprises, blending her deep understanding of emerging technologies with a pragmatic approach to risk mitigation. Lena earned her Ph.D. in Information Systems from ETH Zurich and holds multiple patents in encryption technologies.

As CTO of CGD, Lena oversees the development and deployment of innovative solutions designed to counteract modern cyber threats. She is passionate about bridging the gap between complex technology and user-friendly security systems, making advanced protection accessible to businesses of all sizes. Lena is also an advocate for diversity in tech, actively supporting initiatives aimed at fostering inclusive environments for aspiring professionals.

leadership.cta: Meet the Rest of the Team

reachOut.message: Reach out to our team at CGD, and we'll help you protect your digital future.

iso.title: ISO Certification
iso.description: At CYBERWARE Global Defense, we are proud to be ISO certified, demonstrating our commitment to the highest standards of cybersecurity. Our certification reflects our dedication to protecting your data and ensuring robust security practices across all operations. Trust us to safeguard your digital assets with proven excellence.

certificates.title: ISO/IEC 27001 — Information technology – Security Techniques – Information security management
ISO/IEC 27002 — Code of practice for information security controls

newsletter.title: Stay informed with the latest threat insights delivered directly to your inbox through our Newsletter.

sections.title: SIEM Threat Detection
sections.description: Use SIEM to gain full visibility into security threats by analyzing log data and automating response actions.

sections.title: Penetration Testing
sections.description: Simulate cyberattacks to evaluate the effectiveness of your security measures and uncover weaknesses.

sections.title: Incident Response
sections.description: React promptly to security breaches to minimize disruption, mitigate damages, and recover data.

sections.title: Network Security
sections.description: Protect your networks from threats with robust solutions, monitoring, and secure configurations.

sections.title: Security Awareness Training
sections.description: Educate your employees to recognize cyber threats, avoid risks, and enhance organizational security.
